1. Move all files to merge into working directory
2. Define files as the list of all files in working directory and loop them all into a data frame

```{r}
files <- list.files("C:/Users/Crab Lab/Box/Crab Lab Group Folder/MPA Project/mpa_project_code/bruv-data/data/") #Creates a vector of all file names
maxN_data <- data.frame() #Create empty data frame
for (file in files){
  print(file)
  df <- read.delim(paste0("C:/Users/Crab Lab/Box/Crab Lab Group Folder/MPA Project/mpa_project_code/bruv-data/data/", file), header = TRUE, sep = "\t", dec = ".", skip = 4)
  maxN_data <- rbind.fill(maxN_data, df)
```
